name: The Border
description:
Play as two squares on a journey through challenging routes. Switch square to make their physics stop. Help one another to reach the destination. Keep in mind that certain objects could stop depends on the square.

[UPDATE 7/24/2021 at 3.00 UTC] Swapped some levels to adjust the difficulty.

[UPDATE 7/24/2021 at 7.50 UTC] Added music.

[UPDATE 7/25/2021 at 12.00 UTC] Minor adjustment to some levels

This game is made during GeoJam 2021. This is my first game. It's short (only 10 levels, about 30 minutes), so please give it a try. I hope you enjoy it.

Assets used:

  • Thaleah_PixelFont https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059
  • Casual Game SFX by Dustyroom https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
  • Devotion by JimHall https://freemusicarchive.org/music/jim-hall
